catalog_script_client.name: Auto Populate User

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Testing ">5c5b7bc6c3e32210c114ba2ed4013134</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Auto Populate User</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[// Type: onLoad | Applies to: Catalog Item
function onLoad() {
  // Default 'user' variable (reference to sys_user) to the logged-in user
  if (!g_form.getValue('user')) {
    g_form.setValue('user', g_user.userID()); // sets sys_id of current user
  }
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-25 19:55:37</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>585b7b0ac3e32210c114ba2ed40131bd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Auto Populate User</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Test application" source="x_1813521_test_app">d5f0db42c3232210c114ba2ed40131a0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Test application">d5f0db42c3232210c114ba2ed40131a0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_585b7b0ac3e32210c114ba2ed40131bd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-25 19:55:37</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
